name: harfanglab-edr
label: HarfangLab EDR
description: The connector allows FortiSOAR users to fetch data and take actions on Hurukai HarfangLab EDR platform

fields.title: Server URL
fields.description: URL for the HarfangLab EDR server from where the connector gets notifications.
fields.name: config@base_url

fields.title: API Key
fields.description: API Token configured for your account to access the HarfangLab EDR platform.
fields.name: config@api_key

fields.title: Verify SSL
fields.description: Specifies whether the SSL certificate for the server is to be verified or not.Defaults to True.
fields.name: config@verify_certificate

operations.title: Search Endpoints
operations.description: Search an endpoint in HarfangLab EDR manager.

parameters.title: Hostname
parameters.description: The machine hostname to find
parameters.tooltip: The machine hostname to find
parameters.name: param@hostname

parameters.title: OS Type
parameters.description: Filter by Operating System type
parameters.tooltip: Filter by Operating System type
parameters.name: param@ostype

parameters.title: Status
parameters.description: Filter by status
parameters.tooltip: Filter by status
parameters.name: param@status

parameters.title: Select Fields
parameters.description: Return only these fields
parameters.tooltip: Return only these fields
parameters.name: param@fields

parameters.title: Records To Skip
parameters.description: Start fetching from this record index
parameters.tooltip: Start fetching from this record index
parameters.name: param@offset

parameters.title: Max Records
parameters.description: Maximum records count to fetch
parameters.tooltip: Maximum records count to fetch
parameters.name: param@limit

operations.title: Fetch Security Events
operations.description: Fetches security events from a HarfangLab EDR manager.

parameters.title: Fetch Since
parameters.description: The number of days to look back for alerts
parameters.tooltip: The number of days to look back for alerts
parameters.name: param@first_fetch

parameters.title: Alert Status
parameters.description: Status of alerts to fetch (ACTIVE for alerts in the new, probable_false_positive or investigating statuses, CLOSED for alerts in the closed or false_positive states, leave it empty for all alerts
parameters.tooltip: Status of alerts to fetch (ACTIVE for alerts in the new, probable_false_positive or investigating statuses, CLOSED for alerts in the closed or false_positive states, leave it empty for all alerts
parameters.name: param@alert_status

parameters.title: Alert Type
parameters.description: A comma-separated list of alert types (e.g: sigma,yara,hlai) or leave it empty to fetch all types
parameters.tooltip: A comma-separated list of alert types (e.g: sigma,yara,hlai) or leave it empty to fetch all types
parameters.name: param@alert_type
parameters.placeholder: sigma,yara,hlai,ioc,ransom... (or leave it empty to fetch all types)

parameters.title: Severity
parameters.description: The minimum severity of alerts to fetch (Informational or None for Informational and higher, Low for Low and higher, Medium for Medium and higer, High for High and higher, Critical for Critical)
parameters.tooltip: The minimum severity of alerts to fetch (Informational or None for Informational and higher, Low for Low and higher, Medium for Medium and higer, High for High and higher, Critical for Critical)
parameters.name: param@min_severity

parameters.title: Max Records
parameters.description: The maximum number of alerts to fetch (leave it empty to remove the limit)
parameters.tooltip: The maximum number of alerts to fetch (leave it empty to remove the limit)
parameters.name: param@max_fetch

parameters.title: Delay
parameters.description: Number of seconds back in the past for the upper limit of security event timestamps (keep a value of minimum 120 secondes). If Fetch Since determines the oldest event to fetch, Last Fetch detrmines the most recent
parameters.tooltip: Number of seconds back in the past for the upper limit of security event timestamps (keep a value of minimum 120 secondes). If Fetch Since determines the oldest event to fetch, Last Fetch detrmines the most recent
parameters.name: param@delay

operations.description: Changes the status of a security event

parameters.description: ID or list of IDs of the event(s) to change the status for
parameters.tooltip: ID or list of IDs of the event(s) to change the status for
parameters.name: param@security_event_id

parameters.title: Event Status
parameters.description: Status of alerts to fetch (ACTIVE for alerts in the new, probable_false_positive or investigating statuses, CLOSED for alerts in the closed or false_positive states, leave it empty for all alerts
parameters.tooltip: Status of alerts to fetch (ACTIVE for alerts in the new, probable_false_positive or investigating statuses, CLOSED for alerts in the closed or false_positive states, leave it empty for all alerts
parameters.name: param@status

operations.title: Search Multiple IoCs
operations.description: Search multiple IOCs in HarfangLab telemetry and returns search results

parameters.title: IoCs
parameters.description: The IOCs to search in the following format [{'type': 'md5', value: '1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF'}, ...] (ip, hash, filename...)
parameters.tooltip: The IOCs to search in the following format [{'type': 'md5', value: '1234567890ABCDEF1234567890ABCDEF'}, ...] (ip, hash, filename...)
parameters.name: param@iocs

parameters.title: Search Types
parameters.description: Indicates which types of search to perform
parameters.tooltip: Indicates which types of search to perform
parameters.name: param@search_types

parameters.title: Output Format
parameters.description: The output format (either MARKDOWN or HTML)
parameters.tooltip: The output format (either MARKDOWN or HTML)
parameters.name: param@format

parameters.title: Limit
parameters.description: Limits the number of hit results for each IOC to this number.
parameters.tooltip: Limits the number of hit results for each IOC to this number.
parameters.name: param@limit
